dublin_core.dcvalue: This resource on Monitoring and Evaluating Digital Health Interventions provides step wise guidance to improve the quality and value of monitoring and evaluation M E efforts in the context of digital health interventions also commonly referred to as mHealth or eHealth interventions This Guide is intended for implementers and researchers of digital health activities as well as policy makers seeking to understand the various stages and opportunities for systematically monitoring implementation fidelity and for evaluating the impact of digital health interventions

Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-10T11:45:26Z (GMT). WHO Monitoring and Evaluating Digital Health Interventions: A Practical Guide to Conducting Research and Assessment
WHO Monitoring and Evaluating Digital Health Interventions: A Practical Guide to Conducting Research and Assessment
